thread.section_title: banggood 收到的点评内容 | 消费者对于 banggood 的点评意见 | www.banggood.com
thread.title: Kevin F
thread.title_full: banggood 的点评人 Kevin F

author: Kevin F
title: Kevin F
text: I was able to make a purchase of a product I wanted at a very good price, but the shipments got lost in transit and I never received it. I contacted customer service and they promptly issued a refund. The agent I was in contact with was very polite and friendly and the whole process was hassle free. Their service turned what could have been a 1-star rating into what I consider 5-star service. -idno4856
